item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/chorizo-roast-chicken/comment-page-1/#comment-30">Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella</a>.
Hi Lorraine Unfortunately by the time I was able to serve up the chicken for myself it was almost all gone! I think a subtle smokey pork and spice flavour permeated the chicken, it certainly wasn't hugely flavoured by the chorizo, although the chorizo and crispy chicken skin were lovely!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella.

Hi Lorraine
Unfortunately by the time I was able to serve up the chicken for myself it was almost all gone! I think a subtle smokey pork and spice flavour permeated the chicken, it certainly wasn’t hugely flavoured by the chorizo, although the chorizo and crispy chicken skin were lovely!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Chorizo and BBQ chicken are two of my favourite things. I love how you've stuffed it with chorizo under the skin. Does the smokey pork flavour permeate through the meat?
item.content:encoded: Chorizo and BBQ chicken are two of my favourite things. I love how you’ve stuffed it with chorizo under the skin. Does the smokey pork flavour permeate through the meat?
